subject: College Athletics
Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Lorenzo Charles, known for his last-second dunk for North Carolina State in the 1983 N.C.A.A. tournament, was remembered Saturday at his funeral by friends, former teammates and co-workers.
snippet: Lorenzo Charles, known for his last-second dunk for North Carolina State in the 1983 N.C.A.A. tournament, was remembered Saturday at his funeral by friends, former teammates and co-workers.
